Uses of Package
org.jamesframework.core.search

  • Packages that use org.jamesframework.core.search 
    Package Description
    org.jamesframework.core.search
    Abstract search templates, including both general searches and neighbourhood searches.
    org.jamesframework.core.search.algo
    Actual search implementations; advanced searches with custom components are implemented in separate subpackages.
    org.jamesframework.core.search.algo.exh
    Exhaustive search and related components.
    org.jamesframework.core.search.listeners
    Search listeners.
    org.jamesframework.core.search.stopcriteria
    Stop criteria used by searches.
  • Classes in org.jamesframework.core.search used by org.jamesframework.core.search 
    Class and Description
    NeighbourhoodSearch
    A neighbourhood search extends the general abstract search by adding a concept of current solution, which is repeatedly modified by applying moves generated by a neighbourhood.
    Search
    General abstract search used to solve a problem with the specified solution type.
    SearchStatus
    Enumeration of possible search statuses.
  • Classes in org.jamesframework.core.search used by org.jamesframework.core.search.algo 
    Class and Description
    NeighbourhoodSearch
    A neighbourhood search extends the general abstract search by adding a concept of current solution, which is repeatedly modified by applying moves generated by a neighbourhood.
    Search
    General abstract search used to solve a problem with the specified solution type.
    SingleNeighbourhoodSearch
    Abstract neighbourhood search that uses a single neighbourhood to modify the current solution.
  • Classes in org.jamesframework.core.search used by org.jamesframework.core.search.algo.exh 
    Class and Description
    Search
    General abstract search used to solve a problem with the specified solution type.
  • Classes in org.jamesframework.core.search used by org.jamesframework.core.search.listeners 
    Class and Description
    NeighbourhoodSearch
    A neighbourhood search extends the general abstract search by adding a concept of current solution, which is repeatedly modified by applying moves generated by a neighbourhood.
    Search
    General abstract search used to solve a problem with the specified solution type.
  • Classes in org.jamesframework.core.search used by org.jamesframework.core.search.stopcriteria 
    Class and Description
    Search
    General abstract search used to solve a problem with the specified solution type.
